subtitle:
1
00:00:13,200 --> 00:00:18,500
Lâi-lâi-lâi-lâi, lô-siaⁿ kó͘-siaⁿ hiáng sì-piⁿ
Come, come! Gongs and drums echo all around.

2
00:00:18,500 --> 00:00:22,800
Hiān-chāi chóng chhiáⁿ lia̍t-ūi chèng hiaⁿ-tī
Now I invite all you brothers here today.

3
00:00:22,800 --> 00:00:26,900
Gún chi̍t kiâⁿ gō͘-la̍k-cha̍p miâ
Our traveling troupe has fifty or sixty guys.

4
00:00:26,900 --> 00:00:30,500
Ūi-tio̍h miâ-siaⁿ piàⁿ-sìⁿ-miā
Risking our lives for the sake of fame.

5
00:00:30,500 --> 00:00:33,800
Ah~ chhiáⁿ lín kín lâi khòaⁿ
Ah~ please come and watch quickly!

6
00:00:33,800 --> 00:00:38,500
Liû-lōng kang-ô͘ ê ngē-nńg ê kang-hu
The hard and soft skills of the wandering world.

7
00:00:38,500 --> 00:00:43,500
Kín-lâi kín-lâi kín-lâi--lah
Come quick, come quick, come quick!

8
00:00:55,200 --> 00:00:56,800
Sio̍k-gú teh kóng
As the old saying goes:

9
00:00:56,800 --> 00:01:00,500
Lâng chē oē to̍h chē, saⁿ-sek-lâng kóng gō͘-sek-oē
More people means more gossip; three kinds of people speak five kinds of words.

10
00:01:00,500 --> 00:01:04,800
Ū-lâng ài chia̍h chhài-koe, ah ū-lâng ài khó͘-koe
Some love loofah, while others love bitter melon.

11
00:01:04,800 --> 00:01:10,200
Ū-lâng ài khòaⁿ lāng-lâu, ah ū-lâng ài khòaⁿ phah-kûn-thâu
Some love acrobatics, and some love watching fist-fighting.

12
00:01:10,200 --> 00:01:12,500
Nā ài khòaⁿ kûn-thâu, bián-kiaⁿ bô
If you love fist-fighting, fear not there’s none.

13
00:01:12,500 --> 00:01:16,200
Ji̍t-pún Le̍k-tō-san sī hó-chhiú-to kiam jiû-tō
Japan's Rikidōzan is a master of Karate chops and Judo.

14
00:01:16,200 --> 00:01:19,800
Ah nā Bí-kok phīⁿ-á tok-tok, ba̍k-chiu lô-lô
And the Americans with their high noses and deep-set eyes...

15
00:01:19,800 --> 00:01:24,200
I nā beh phah nn̄g-pō͘ ah, kóng-tio̍h ài bo̍k-sìng-gù chiah sǹg ē hô
If they strike a pose, it has to be "Boxing" to count as a match.

16
00:01:24,200 --> 00:01:27,500
Ìn-tō͘ o͘ kap tōa-kho͘ thong-lâng chai
India's "Black and Big" is known to all.

17
00:01:27,500 --> 00:01:30,500
Nā Tiong-kok Ta̍t-mô ê kang-hu siōng lī-hāi
But China's Bodhidharma Kung Fu is the most powerful.

18
00:01:30,500 --> 00:01:32,800
Ah nā sió-tī chin put-châi
As for me, your humble brother, I have no talent.

19
00:01:32,800 --> 00:01:35,200
Pak-tó͘ nā iau choân pō͘-sò͘
When my belly is hungry, I have full strategies.

20
00:01:35,200 --> 00:01:37,800
Iā pak-tó͘ nā pá to̍h bô-pòaⁿ-pō͘
But when my belly is full, I haven't got a single move!

21
00:01:37,800 --> 00:01:39,500
Lâi khòaⁿ
Come watch!

22
00:01:39,500 --> 00:01:41,800
Thài-chó͘-kûn sī phah ngē-ki
Taizu Fist strikes the hard limbs.

23
00:01:41,800 --> 00:01:44,500
Pe̍h-ho̍h-kûn sī chhiūⁿ môa-chî
White Crane Fist is soft like mochi.

24
00:01:44,500 --> 00:01:46,800
Kâu-kûn sī hó kha-chhiú
Monkey Fist has good technique.

25
00:01:46,800 --> 00:01:49,000
Káu-kûn sī chia̍h ba̍k-chiu
Dog Fist attacks the eyes.

26
00:01:49,000 --> 00:01:52,800
Tah... Phah chi̍t pō͘ thun-kim pàng-kah khí-chhiú lo̍h-chhah
Hah! Watch this move: Swallow Gold, Release Armor, raise hand, plunge down!

27
00:01:52,800 --> 00:01:55,200
Oeh, chit pō͘ kha-chhiú ài siak-phah
Hey, this move needs a forceful snap!

28
00:01:55,200 --> 00:01:58,800
Nā-bô ē kán-ná chhin-chhiūⁿ bîn-chhn̂g-téng tī-leh thiàu Lûn-pah
Otherwise, it looks just like dancing the Rumba on a bed.

29
00:01:58,800 --> 00:02:00,800
Lâi, kang-hu nā beh hó
Come, if you want good Kung Fu...

30
00:02:00,800 --> 00:02:02,200
To̍h lán pún-tó
It's right here on our island.

31
00:02:02,200 --> 00:02:03,800
Nā beh ē to̍h lán kuì-tē
If you want to train, it's our honored place.

32
00:02:03,800 --> 00:02:05,500
Nā beh gâu to̍h lán tē-thâu
If you want to be skilled, it's our territory.

33
00:02:05,500 --> 00:02:07,500
Sió-tī nn̄g-saⁿ-pō͘ phiàn-chia̍h-pō͘
I only have a few tricks to make a living.

34
00:02:07,500 --> 00:02:09,200
Bāng kok-ūi to-to chí-kàu
I hope everyone will give me much advice.

35
00:02:09,200 --> 00:02:11,500
To-to chí-kàu lah
Give me much advice!

36
00:02:18,200 --> 00:02:23,500
Lâi-lâi-lâi-lâi, kim-ji̍t iú-iân lâi siong-hông
Come, come! Fate brings us together today.

37
00:02:23,500 --> 00:02:28,500
Bêng-ji̍t chiū beh koh chài oāⁿ pa̍t-ūi
Tomorrow we must move to another place.

38
00:02:28,500 --> 00:02:32,800
Thài-chó͘-kûn chhiūⁿ thih-ki
Taizu Fist is like an iron bar.

39
00:02:32,800 --> 00:02:37,500
Pe̍h-ho̍h-kûn sī chhiūⁿ môa-chî
White Crane Fist is soft like mochi.

40
00:02:37,500 --> 00:02:43,200
Ah~ chhiáⁿ lín kín lâi khòaⁿ
Ah~ please come and watch quickly!

41
00:02:43,200 --> 00:02:49,500
Liû-lōng kang-ô͘ ê ngē-nńg ê kang-hu
The hard and soft skills of the wandering world.

42
00:02:49,500 --> 00:02:55,000
Kín-lâi kín-lâi kín-lâi--lah
Come quick, come quick, come quick!
